links.title: Jaguar I-Pace vs Tesla Model X 75D drag race
links.description: Can the new Jaguar I-Pace electric SUV beat the Tesla Model X 75D in a 0-60-0mph drag race challenge? Jaguar put the two cars head-to-head as part of the launch of the I-Pace. This is Jaguar's video and nothing to do with Auto Express but we thought you'd like to see it anyway.

messages.body: Going long on $GLOB, $AMAZ, $FIZZ, $ANAB, $HXL, $SGBX, and $TSLA. 100 shares each to start off 2018.
$TSLA 360 to 300. 300 to 360. Rinse and repeat. Look at the price action at 339 for a short entry to back under 320 this week.
$TSLA is at the brink of the mobility as a service s-curve. Every car they manufacture should be viewed and valued with that in mind. LONG
